name: Orbital (itch) (Exedys, Inc.)
description:
Play as a single spaceship and protect 7 different planets from a fossil-fueled fleet of opposing ships. Use various powerups and defend against the onslaught of enemies. There are 3 different classes of enemies which get more difficult over time.  All of the planets also have their own high scores which you can compete for. You can also play the endless mode where you can try to beat your previous times. The game can be played on Keyboard & Mouse or Gamepad.

This game was my entry for the Bafta YGD 2020 Game Making competition.
